original_title: Sir Arthur Conan Doyle: The Real Sherlock Holmes
overview: There are few characters from literature that take on a life of their own, but Sherlock Holmes, Sir Arthur Conan Doyleâ€™s fictional detective, is definitely one of them. Come unlock the mystery of the man behind Sherlock Holmes and witness the birth of the greatest detective of all time in this fascinating, exclusive documentary.
title: Sir Arthur Conan Doyle: The Real Sherlock Holmes
